attributes.action: The BBC should make a public apology over the fake libya footage.
attributes.additional_details:
I would like government to make the BBC apologise publicly, over the false footage of libya they showed on the BBC breakfast show.

The footage claimed it was Tripoli in Libya when in fact it was footage of the protesters in India supporting Anna Hazare.

I would like a formal public apology to get back the trust the bbc has lost with this false and misleading news.
